perera danapathiwarayage maniyan wu jeramiyes diyes mathiniya wisin karanu labu dhana parithyagayen kaluthara bodhiye pahala maluwe thappaya saha mal asun sadu bawa sandahan we.inpasu 1972 sita 1982 dakwa pura dashakayak thula polis widyalaye hitapu polis adhyakshaka (pasuwa amithagaweshi namin pawidiwa sita apawathwu) siril eekanayaka, deshiya aadayam departhamenthuwe hitapu komasaris adhinithignya el.el. premawardhana alwis saha puwathpath kalawedi diwakara mohotti yana mahathwaru wisin mema punya bhumiye pragathiya wenuwen dharmadarsha sangamaya mangin dharma gaweshi pinkam malawak irida dinawala menma, poho dinawala suwishesha mahangu sewawak itu karanu labuni.kaluthara bo samndu pilibandawa shrimath siril da soyisa gunawathanan mese sihipath karana ladi.
